item.title: Version 1.0.0 - Initial Release
item.description:
üéâ Introducing contributor.info

We're excited to announce the official 1.0 release of contributor.info! This platform helps maintainers and contributors understand the health and dynamics of open source repositories through data-driven insights.

üöÄ Major Features

  • AI-Powered Repository Insights - Real-time analysis with health assessments, smart recommendations, and PR attention detection
  • Dynamic Social Media Cards - Auto-generated social cards with repository metrics
  • Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard - Lottery factor analysis, contribution patterns, language distribution, and monthly rankings

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed mobile responsiveness issues on contribution charts
  • Improved 404 page interactions and color consistency
  • Resolved authentication flow issues for first-time users
  • Fixed skeleton loader animations during data fetching

üìä By the Numbers

  • 35 test suites with 291 passing tests
  • 80%+ code coverage across critical paths
  • <3s average page load time
  • 99.9% uptime since soft launch
